categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tia Mirabel was a human Jedi Master and archivist of the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era. As an archivist, Mirabel knew more about Force artifacts than anyone else in the Order. Mirabel was chosen by the Jedi High Council alongside Masters Giktoo Nelmo and Poreht La to assist with a ritual intended to purify four statues which were believed to be containing dark side power.
